links.notes:
This week I was able to create the template for my portfolio and notes for this class. It was sort of a review from last semester using, when I improve my JS skills.

First, I wrote the content of my portfolio in an HTML file. This helped me stay organized and style faster. I was able to review the example provided by our teacher, and this gave me a better idea on how to develop this assignment.

In order to maintain simplicity and a clean code, I decided to use an external JSON file to store everything each week.

No questions came up this week.
